subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4287 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Derrik Pompeo,  Expected delivery around the 10th  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047116240885

Is there nothing in the US? I can come faster I receive petals from Amazon and they are missing the box all the puddles plug into so I’m buying this so it’s like I’m buying it two times. Sent from my iPhone

Hi Derrik Pompeo,    The accessories for the main control box are currently not in stock at our US warehouse, so they can only be shipped from our China warehouse. We will arrange the shipment for you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.
Where is the control box? Sent from my iPhone
Where is my package? Sent from my iPhone
It’s the 11th and I still don’t have it Sent from my iPhone
It’s the 12th and I have nothing control box. Sent from my iPhone
Hi Derrik Pompeo,     I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it? https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047116240885
